title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Joe Manchin to vote against HR1. Manchin slams the breaks on Democrat plans to transform the country, change voting rules to become a permanent majority. Trump rallies GOP in NC, endorses Budd for Senate; rips Fauci, ChiComs, Zuckerberg. As Rush predicted, Biden's expanded unemployment benefits have become welfare, disincentives to work. Rush takes a 2010 call on gaming the unemployment system. South Dakota caller on the futility of government. Capitalism is the answer. Caller thinks GOP can't win with Trump as face of party.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Don't let your opponent choose your candidate. Let the primaries decide who our 2024 nominee is. Biden's DOJ caught spying on journalists. Rush on the Washington Post's slogan "Democracy Dies in Darkness." David Limbaugh on what Millie Limbaugh thought of Rush's success. Treasury Secretary Yellen says higher interest rates would be better for the country. Rush on the threat EU-style socialism poses to American capitalism. Hacking and ransomware attacks ramp up. Rush on ChiCom hackers. Clock is ticking on Democrats to get a win on something not connected to covid money. Vaccine suppression?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush knew what BLM was all about right from the start. Rush on Senator Joe Manchin: There's no such thing as a "conservative Democrat." Monday Musing: Rush explains the Never Trumper mentality. EIB High Note: Clippers and Cops. Caller: Only Donald Trump can finish what he started. Arizona listener on the vote audit. Biden fails to commemorate D-Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
